net.gree.asdk.api
Interface GreePlatform.BadgeListener

Enclosing class:
GreePlatform
public static interface GreePlatform.BadgeListener

Listener called after every badge update. The badge show the number of unread notifications for your application. You need to register it with the GreePlatform.updateBadgeValues(net.gree.asdk.api.GreePlatform.BadgeListener) method.

Method Summary
 void onBadgeCountUpdated(int newCount)
          This is called every time the notification count has been updated.
 

Method Detail

onBadgeCountUpdated

void onBadgeCountUpdated(int newCount)
This is called every time the notification count has been updated.

Parameters:
newCount - the new badge count for this application.
